document.title: Module CAFCR course info logo TBD
document.abstract: This module provides the information about the CAFCR course: "Multi-Objective Embedded Systems Design, based on CAFCR". Distribution This article or presentation is written as part of the Gaud project. The Gaud project philosophy is to improve by obtaining frequent feedback. Frequent feedback is pursued by an open creation process. This document is published as intermediate or nearly mature version to get feedback. Further distribution is allowed as long as the document remains complete and unchanged. All Gaud documents are available at: http://www.extra.research.philips.com/natlab/sysarch/ version: 0 status: draft 5th July 2004 Contents 1 Multi-Objective Embedded Systems design, based on CAFCR 1 1.1

author.name: Gerrit Muller
author.address: Den Dolech 2 (Laplace Building 0.10) P.O. Box 513, 5600 MB Eindhoven The Netherlands
